content.query:
DROP EXTERNAL TABLE DIM_Depo;

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'synapse_citylogisticsstorage_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [synapse_citylogisticsstorage_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE DIM_Depo (
	[depo.id] bigint,
	[depo.name] nvarchar(4000),
	[dispatch.site] nvarchar(4000),
	[depo.address] nvarchar(4000),
	[depo.suburb] nvarchar(4000),
	[depo.city] nvarchar(4000),
	[depo.zipcode] nvarchar(4000),
	[depo.region] nvarchar(4000),
	[depo.lat] float,
	[depo.lng] float,
	[depo.placeid] nvarchar(4000),
	[depo.w3w] nvarchar(4000),
	[depo.insdate] bigint,
	[depo.update] bigint,
	[depo.lmsid] int,
	[depo.country] nvarchar(4000),
	[depo.status] nvarchar(4000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'DataLake/Structured/Dimensions/Dim_Depo.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [synapse_citylogisticsstorage_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.DIM_Depo
GO
